Comment: Our debt is their collection of tribute.

Comment: According to the author of the report, Clyde Wayne Crews Jr., regulations got worse under the Biden Administration because of the progressive rules imposed on energy, consumer appliances, labor, banking, online speech, and other sectors of the economy.    “Trump after just two months, in stark contrast to Biden, is defunding progressive advocacy sources within the federal government and defunding or at least deflating certain agencies in addition to promising larger spending cuts that we certainly hope materialize,” said Crews
Author: Sure-Wishbone-4293
